column5: Hi fellow members,  Need some advise where can I try some Silver bass fishing within 2 hrs from Toronto. Actually I don't want to go back to Windsor or North Bay because I don't have the luxury of time anymore. Pease let me know by replying this post or pm me.  Thanks in advance!
Pick a pier sticking out into Lake Ontario.  You'll find silver bass.
Lot's in the lower Credit in Mississauga.
